arm_group.description: Subjects with a previous 18F-AV-1451 scan will receive an IV injection, 370  megabecquerel (MBq) (10 millicurie [mCi]), single dose of 18F-AV-1451. Subjects with an unknown amyloid status will receive an IV injection, 370 megabecquerel (MBq) (10 millicurie [mCi]), single dose of florbetapir F 18.

brief_summary.textblock:
This study will evaluate the imaging characteristics of 18F-AV-1451 in subjects with a
      previous 18F-AV-1451 scan in order to assess the rate of change of tau deposition over time.

clinical_study.brief_title: Imaging Characteristics of a Follow-up 18F-AV-1451 Scan

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Have a previous 18F-AV-1451 brain scan

          -  Can tolerate up to two Positron Emission Tomography (PET) imaging sessions and a
             Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) scan

          -  Ability to provide informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Current clinically significant psychiatric disease

          -  Are claustrophobic

          -  Current clinically significant cardiovascular disease or ECG abnormalities, or
             additional risk factors for Torsades de Pointes

          -  Current clinically significant infectious disease, endocrine or metabolic disease,
             pulmonary, renal or hepatic impairment, or cancer

          -  Females of childbearing potential who are not surgically sterile, not refraining from
             sexual activity or not using reliable methods of contraception

          -  Have had a non-study related radiopharmaceutical imaging or treatment procedure
             within 7 days prior to the study imaging session

clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label, Multicenter Study, Evaluating the Imaging Characteristics of a Follow-up 18F-AV-1451 Scan in Subjects Who Have Had a Prior 18F-AV-1451 Scan

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: To assess the rate of change of tau deposition as measured by 18F-AV-1451 standard uptake value ratio (SUVr) over time.
primary_outcome.time_frame: At least 6 months after initial 18F-AV-1451 scan

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic
